DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy cognitive training subject subjective memory impairment . The first group receive cognitive training lifestyle modification combination , second group receive lifestyle modification , third group receive intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Cognitive Training Subjective Memory Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: Subjective memory impairment currently think risky state progression Alzheimer 's disease . This study aim confirm whether cognitive training subjective memory impairment would show improvement subjective objective cognition . We include subject normal cognition complain subjective feeling memory decline conduct cognitive training program combine lifestyle modification 3 month . We evaluate neuropsychological test questionnaire subjective improvement 3 month intervention .
DOC.criteria: Subjects show normal range ( 16percentile norm ) domains detailed neuropsychological test battery name Seoul Neuropsychological Screening Battery ( SNSB ) Clinical dementia rating ( CDR ) score 0 Subjects least 3 year formal education Subjects mild cognitive impairment dementia Subjects diagnose neurological disorder epilepsy , stroke , hemorrhage , hydrocephalus , Parkinson 's disease brain tumor Subjects uncontrolled severe medical condition accord investigator 's opinion
